backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining data models, maps, authorization setup, and state for agents, users, customers, leads, messages, and logs.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module transforming old agent profiles to new ones by resetting status to pending during upgrade.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report detailing frontend changes required to surface backend fetch errors in admin agent approval views.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose and changes of various frontend components and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/PRODUCTION_DEPLOYMENT_LOGS.md: Template for recording deployment steps, outputs, and verification details for production releases.
frontend/PRODUCTION_STABILIZATION.md: Documentation outlining production issues, root causes, and stabilization changes across versions 14–16.
frontend/scripts/deploy-mainnet-version1: Runbook with procedural steps and checklists for deploying Version 16 to mainnet.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling authentication flow, startup guards, lazy-loaded dashboards, and global layout.
frontend/src/components/AdminAddCustomer: Dialog component for admins to add a new customer with validation and form fields, submitting via useAddCustomer. Filters approved agents and resets state after successful submission.
frontend/src/components/AdminAddLeadDial: Dialog form for creating a new lead with validation, status and requirement selection, and assigned agent. Submits via useAddLead and resets fields on success.
frontend/src/components/AdminCustomersLi: Displays a filterable list of customers with call and WhatsApp actions and supports admin creation of new customers. Fetches customers and agents, showing loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/AdminFollowUpsLi: Lists all follow-ups with agent filtering, overdue detection, and access to linked customer or lead details. Handles loading and empty states and provides call/WhatsApp actions.
frontend/src/components/AdminInvoicePane: UI for generating and sending invoices via WhatsApp to customers or leads. Includes a dialog with form fields and uses local state to manage invoice details.
frontend/src/components/AdminLeadsList.t: Displays and filters all leads for admins with agent/status filters, overdue detection, WhatsApp/Call shortcuts, and CSV export.
frontend/src/components/AdminOverviewPan: Shows admin-level summary stats for agents and leads with navigation to filtered views and basic contact actions.
frontend/src/components/AdminWhatsAppPan: Provides a communication hub showing customers and leads by agent with WhatsApp and call actions plus simple contact stats.
frontend/src/components/AgentCustomersLi: Lets agents view and manage their customers, add new entries, and contact them via WhatsApp or phone.
frontend/src/components/AgentFollowUpsLi: Allows agents to list, add, and track follow-ups for customers or leads with overdue detection and contact actions.
frontend/src/components/AgentLeadsList.t: Displays an agent’s leads, allows adding new leads, and includes WhatsApp/call actions with overdue detection.
frontend/src/components/AgentWhatsAppPan: Shows customers and leads in tabs with WhatsApp/call actions and random contact stats.
frontend/src/components/ApprovedAgentsLi: Lists approved agents with login status and exports their data to CSV.
frontend/src/components/CameraCapture.ts: Provides a dialog-based camera interface to capture face images with support/error handling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays site header with branding and login/logout via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/LoginForm.tsx: Handles agent login with mandatory face capture and error-based toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/PendingAgentsLis: Displays pending agent registrations with approve/reject actions and handles loading, errors, and image previews.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal form for users to submit name, mobile, and email, saving the profile via mutation.
frontend/src/components/RegisterForm.tsx: Agent registration form that captures user details and a face image before submitting to the backend.
frontend/src/components/StartupGate.tsx: Wrapper that shows loading or error UI before rendering children based on startup state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorStable.ts: Stable actor hook that initializes the backend actor with performance markers and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and authentication status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profiles, admin checks, agent approval flows, and related mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useStartupGuards.ts: Combines identity, user profile, and admin status queries to provide startup loading, error, and retry state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and color variables for light and dark themes with global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Implements an admin dashboard with tabbed panels loaded lazily for managing agents, customers, leads, and other resources.
frontend/src/pages/AgentDashboard.tsx: Renders the agent dashboard with approval checks, profile loading, error handling, and lazy-loaded tab panels.
frontend/src/pages/AuthPage.tsx: Provides a registration and login interface using tabbed forms within a styled card layout.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: Defines frontend types for users, agents, customers, leads, and follow-ups, mirroring backend structures.
frontend/src/utils/approvalStatus.ts: Normalizes backend approval status values and provides helper checks for pending, approved, or rejected states.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Offers CSV escaping, conversion, downloading, and filename generation utilities.
frontend/src/utils/startupPerf.ts: Provides development-only utilities for measuring performance timing during startup.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with session storage support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state snapshot describing CRM requirements, architecture notes, known issues, and implemented features for Admin/Agent workflows.
